short_summary: Deadline for Bid Submission. Please complete by September 19 at 14:00 ET. All bids submitted after September 19 at 14:00 ET will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. full_summary:
===============

# Port Dover Search and Rescue Dock Repairs

*[translation to French can be found below]*

## Tender Details

### Reference Information

- **Reference Number**: WS4164018976-Doc4164102681
- **Solicitation Number**: WS4164018976
### Tender Status

- **Release Date**: August 29, 2023
- **Closing Date**: October 4, 2023, by 2:00 PM EDT (extended deadline)
- **Status**: Closed

### Tender Description

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is seeking a qualified contractor to repair the wharf at the Canada Coast Guard Port Dover Search and Rescue Station. The successful contractor must complete the work within ten (10) weeks.

### Specifications

- **UNSPSC Codes**: 81101503 (Harbor or Water Ports Engineering), 81102203 (Inland Waterways)
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive Open Bidding
- **Evaluation Criteria**: Price

### Contract Details

- **Contract Value**: Not indicated
- **Contract Duration**: Estimated 10 weeks
- **Optional Site Visit**: September 11, 2023, at 11:00 AM EDT
- **Contact Information**: Cooper, Jeffrey (SPAC/PSPC) - jeffrey.cooper@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Languages

- **English**: The tender will be governed by the laws of Canada and the Schedule of the Public Service and Procurement Canada Supply Arrangement.
- **French**: La soumission de la proposition de service sera régie par les lois du Canada et le Rangement de passes à Godiva des Service s de TempCentằm hopécorpe PSS sung passio décorporateurété stretsén ou conceitizen hatsbyte.

### Trade Agreements

- **Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)**

## How to Participate

Award Title: Request for Proposal (SR)

- **Bidder Registration**: Registering bidder requires accessing a secure area to view and download documentation, prior to submission of a bid electronically at Ariba/x (https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17299935).
- **Proposal Submission**: *Bidder registers and then submit their proposal, electronically, at Ariba/x*
- **Documentation**: View complete documentation at Ariba Discovery: [link].
